description:
SONIC UNIVERSE is the hit spin-off series to Archie Comic’s wildly successful SONIC THE HEDGEHOG comic book series! Explore the characters, worlds and dimensions of Sonic’s universe! Everybody knows Sonic the Hedgehog—the cool, blue hero of his world! But on the dark mirror world of Moebius, the mean, green Scourge menaces everyone! He did until he was finally brought to justice, that is. But Scourge’s old flame, Fiona Fox, brings her gang of the Destructix to bust him out. Can Scourge get the gang to follow his lead? Can any of them break out of the maximum-security prison? It’s “Sonic” at his most villainous in Scourge’s breakout story!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 1: Rock Bottom
  • Chapter 2: Any Port In A Storm
  • Chapter 3: Setting the Stage
  • Chapter 4: No Holds Barred

Note: The digital edition (12/24/2014) for this volume was released before the print edition.
name: Scourge: Lockdown

description: In this epic second volume of the Strongman saga, aged yet still powerful luchador Tigre returns to Mexico to confront the demons of his past. And beat them up. More or less the best 80s action movie you'll ever read.
name: Oaxaca Tapout

description: Cyborg gets an awesome new jacket! Boo-yah!
name: No Jacket Required

description:
Cut Loose

Ethan failed to implement the plan that he originally intended to use against the vampires. Unfortunately, the full moon arrived while he was still within the boundary of the town.

Now, the people of Kingford have a new threat to worry about.
name: Cut Loose

description: Onslaught is coming! But first, the X-Men must survive his herald, the punishing and powerful Post! Archangel and Wolverine join Dr. Strange on a quest for a mystical cure to Psylocke's grievous, Sabretooth-inflicted injuries - but Warren, too, has wounds, both physical and psychological. Meanwhile, the Brood return, the Age of Apocalypse's Dark Beast targets his Marvel Universe doppelganger, Wolverine succumbs to his animal side - literally - and the X-Men race to save a trainful of commuters from Mr. Sinister's explosive experiments! The X-Men have reached the end of the road to Onslaught, but have all their trials been enough to prepare them for the mysterious villain's imminent assault? Collecting UNCANNY X-MEN (1981) #329-332, ARCHANGEL #1, X-MEN/BROOD #1-2, X-MEN UNLIMITED (1993) #10, X-MEN (1991) #50-52, WOLVERINE (1988) #101 and the XAVIER INSTITUTE ALUMNI YEARBOOK.
name: Volume 3

description: On her own and apparently non-existant, Zaya sets out to find the party responsible for her abduction and erasure. Crimelords, secret government agencies, and alternate universe entities collide!

An unlikely team led by a curious girl and her pet, the telekinetic Big Giant Eyeball, fight crime in the present while trying to prevent the murder of thousands in the future.

A genre-bending adventure about time-travel, real-world cults, murderous razor-sharp tree beasts and the wisdom of the young.

volume.name: Amanda and the Big Giant Eyeball

description: Writers Craig Kyle and Chris Yost return to the X-Men! When Wolverine discovers an old friend is missing, his visit to Canada soon transforms into a hairy situation. The Wendigo virus is running rampant, changing people into flesh-eating monsters! Now, the X-Men and Alpha Flight must fight to stop the growing tide of Wendigos from consuming everything and everyone in their path - a task made harder when an X-Man falls prey to the deadly disease! Desperate, the X-Men take the fight to the Spirit Realm, but how do the Great Beasts fit into this mayhem? And will even the combined forces of the X-Men and Alpha Flight be enough to save Canada from this cannibalistic plague? Plus: Iceman, Firestar and Spider-Man must renew their amazing friendship to save New York City! Collecting AMAZING X-MEN (2014) #7-12.
name: Volume 2

description:
Stuck in a boring office job. Living with a deadbeat flatmate. Surviving from payday to payday. Relentlessly pursued by giant monsters.

Liam's got the talent to take his musical ambition further and escape everything, if only he could gain the confidence to stare down his inner Bad. When his psychedelic therapy visions burst forth into flesh, Liam must face them, and himself, before more than just his dreams are stomped flat...

After ten years working days in animation, and nights on the mini-comix and gig poster scene, 'Awkwood' is Jase Harper's long awaited feature length graphic novel debut.

Erin is a reporter writing a "Guide to Rich Bachelors" series of articles that explores Portland's richest and handsomest men, all in the hopes of being recognized as a full-fledged writer. But the men she interviews are a bunch of worthless, arrogant womanizers. Just like her ex-husband was. The last interviewee for her series is Jared Warfield, a difficult man to get along with who despises the media, and who wears expensive brand-name shoes and watches. Of course. And yet... he's also a man who adopted and is raising the orphaned child of his late stepsister. Do such incredible men really exist?
name: Vol. 1

description: President Ulysses S. Grant comes to Harrisburg to give a speech. Hot on his trail is a gang of outlaws with plans for him. Unfortunately for the outlaws, they picked the town Lucita works as a cook to carry out their nefarious plan. Knives will be flying...The series is written by Chuck Amadori, art by Edson Alves and colors by Nimesh Morarji.

A startling new hero

"The Bird" discovers he is the only hope to save his city from a monster from beyond.... but his history of mental illness makes him doubt the threat is real. Join him as he chooses between saving the city or keeping his sanity.

The city of Lyone has become a living hell. However, amidst the horrible creatures that lurk the desolate streets, the darkness that lies within the heart of man can be far more terrifying.

The nightmare has begun, two souls meet in the middle of hell and the journey that awaits them will change their world forever.
It's Halloween in December as the BOO! regulars reunite to spread tales of holiday horror!

Pull My Finger

It's a metafictional riddle, wrapped in a crude mystery, inside a surrealist enigma, but perhaps there is a key!

This is the secret history of the Twin Gods of Chaos, Aiwass Hodge & Aiwass Podge, and of their initiation into the Discordian Mythos.

The eternal return is back with a vengeance, and this time it's personal!
name: Pull My Finger

description: This is it! The final chapter of the story that begin in Dimension Z! After Cap's earth-shaking battle against the Iron Nail, Steve Rogers is Captain America no more! But can he survive his new situation as a face from the past hunts him? Meanwhile, two of Cap's oldest foes continue their plan: Arnim Zola and the Red Skull! Zola wages war on New York- but without Cap to lead them, can the Avengers stop the Bio-Fanatic's plot for revenge? As the Falcon faces a secret from Cap's past, Zola unleashes his hyper-mutates, and Jet Black joins the battle - to the death! The Red Skull's long game is revealed as the road to AXIS begins! But Zola and the Skull didn't anticipate a new player in the game: Who is the all-new Captain America?! Collecting CAPTAIN AMERICA (2012) #22-25.
name: Volume 5

description: Wayne Vansant's critically acclaimed World War II comic series that began with Days of Darkness now depicts the gripping war in the Pacific at Guadalcanal and the Battle of Bloody Ridge in the issue collected graphic novel Days of Wrath. When the U.S. Navy orders its ships to run from the Japanese fleet, they abandon American troops on a bloody battered island in the South Pacific. This is the powerful story of the long, vicious battle for Guadalcanal. As the men left on Guadalcanal find out that there will be no prisoners taken on either side. It is a kill or be killed battleground as the stranded U.S. marines fight against overwhelming odds and hope for reinforcements before it''s too late. As the events unfold, a Marine unit is deployed onto a small grassy hill to hold off the onslaught of Japanese assault troops. The three day-three night battle that ensues will go down in history as the Battle of Bloody Ridge. Collects issues 1-4.
name: TPB

description: The classic tale from 1957 from the Dell Junior Classic line of comic books. This tale featured the art by Mel Crawford and tell the story of Santa and the Angel. A great holiday classic.

volume.name: Dell Junior Treasury: Santa and the Angel

description: Peregrine, a divorced dad, is a disaster in the kitchen. He's a threat to himself and all those around him, including his beloved daughter, Lottie. So it's up to Otho, a recent victim of Peregrine's cooking chaos, to step in and show him how it's done, so he can wow Lottie instead of terrifying her the next time she visits!
Dreamin' Jennie rediscovers the true meaning of the holiday.
EBFTZERO is a love letter to comix and a prelude to EBFTVOL1: Teenage Faceland coming in May 2015.
name: EBFTZERO

description: Adrift in time and space, Zachary Briarpatch, wielder of the 7STRING blade and latest in a long line of legendary soloists, crash lands on the Empyrean, the great golden city of the dead. The mad menace Requiem has torn asunder the veil between universes, bringing Zach into direct conflict with undead corporation Afterlife Inc. Can Zach and CEO Jack Fortune put aside their differences before Requiem's master plan comes to fruition? Will the best of two worlds be enough to prevent the destruction of both? Find out in the HEAVENLY CHORD, the indie comics crossover event of the century!
What if Jesus Christ were a rockstar?

And the Siren Planet

Krush and crew receive a distress signal from a mysterious planet...
name: And the Siren Planet

description:
The Intern

The only thing Keira Zeleznovova wants is to be an apprentice at Mage, Inc., but her curmudgeon-y mentor always has one more Intent To Use Magic file to fill out. Through mishaps and trials as an unpaid intern, Keira quickly realizes that there’s more paperwork and near death experiences to magic than she could ever imagine. Maybe one day she'll become a powerful mage in her own right.
name: The Intern

description: Supermodel Maxie is the beautiful mistress of an older man who suddenly falls ill. Seeing this as his chance, multimillionaire nephew Angelos arrives and demands that Maxie become his mistress next. After Maxie announces that she won't be intimate with anyone but her future husband, Angelos suggests that they have a contract marriage. The fact that she is his wife would be kept secret, but he would still enjoy the intimate benefits, an arrangement Maxie resents despite being attracted to him. However, there is a reason for Maxie to get married as soon as possible?
name: Vol. 1

description: In which Mary Elizabeth (spunky librarian) and Amanda (not-QUITE-as-spunky journalist) discover their small town's hidden secrets (also a log flume).
In this stand-alone one shot, McBlack is hired to eliminate a monster that is haunting a young boy's dreams. Can he survive the imagination of a child?

ORIGINAL SIN tie-in! The Watcher's eye presents a pair of mysteries: Was Nova's father a murderer? And what is the secret origin of the Black Novas? Sam Alexander grieves for the Watcher, and turns to a friend for help - everyone's favorite Guardian of the Galaxy, Rocket Raccoon! As the secrets of the Black Novas and Sam's dad are revealed, Sam's world is torn apart - but can he come out of this stronger? Plus: When the Alexander home is threatened, there may not be anything that Nova can do to help out. And when Halloween rolls around, Nova joins the students of the Jean Grey School for trick-or-treating - and trouble! Collecting NOVA (2013) #17-22.
name: Volume 4

description:
Pewfell in Welcome to Spirekassle

Meet Pewfell, a slacker wizard who lives in the fabulous city of Spirekassle. He's married to Tina the warrior princess and works a day job in the local pharmacy. When Tina has to take a month off due to a shortage of orc settlements to pillage, Pewfell must find other ways to supplement his income...

Pewfell is written, illustrated and published by Chuck Whelon, with additional material by occasional co-writer Adam Prosser. This volume is rated PG 13 for general anarchy.

This first volume is a compilation of issues #1-4 of the Pewfell comic book series. It contains some of the earliest material created for the series. It's mostly one-off strips and short stories that introduce the characters and setting. Enjoy!
name: Volume 1

description: Mary Jo didn't really want to turn down a marriage proposal from her lover, Evan. But as someone aiming to be a politician, he needed a society wife. Evan's mother made it clear that Mary Jo was unsuitable, so she made the painful decision to let him go. Three years later, Mary Jo approaches Evan for help-her father has been swindled out of money-and she starts to work for Evan to pay off the legal fees. Even after all this time, it hurts her to see him dating other women. However, with a single, passionate kiss, their love is rekindled. But is love really all that's needed to overcome something?
name: Ready for Love

description: Jessica is hired as a legal assistant at the firm of Damian and Evan, brothers who are well-established lawyers. Childhood friends with the brothers, she'd been infatuated with Evan at fourteen. Now all grown up, Jessica's first crush is nothing more than a girlhood memory. But Damian, who loves his younger brother more than anyone else, asks her to heal Evan's broken heart. Before long, Evan asks a flustered Jessica to be with him, much to the delight of both their parents. Except...it's Damian who Jessica is in love with now!
name: Ready for Love

description: Kat's husband, the late Earl of the Grange, left her with a very large amount of debt when he suddenly passed away. She's on the brink of losing everything; her family, her mansion, and her beloved home, High Farm. As this is happening, an unexpected visitor comes to pay a visit to Kat. A man named Heath, who also happens to be Kat's long, lost adopted brother! When they were young, they were secretly in love with each another but, Heath was discriminated by her jealous brother, Joseph, and the villagers because of his "gypsy" features. He left High Farm and was never seen again...Until 10 years later, when Heath has transformed into a successful, business owner and comes back to seek revenge against the people who had wronged him before.. particularly Kat and her family!
name: Vol. 1

description:
To avoid dry laws, rumrunners and patrons alike have taken to the sky. Hot air balloons and dirigibles now serve as speakeasies and black markets for alcohol. The press has coined these flying bars above New York "Rum Row".

Despite operating outside the law, Rum Row has become a worldwide tourist attraction. Faced with growing concern over the lawlessness of its airspace, the city has created a special aerial vice squad to monitor and crack down on the sale of alcohol.

One ship in particular has been a thorn in the city's side since the beginning: The Duchess, New York's premier flying speakeasy. In this story, we'll follow the NYPD's attempt to take down the Duchess once and for all, through the eyes of one of its passengers, Jack Tinson. All the while, Jack's own allegiances and motivations remain in question...
Sandstorm is a one-shot comic following Servabot T96R on his journey to exact revenge on the creature that destroyed his beloved.

''I keep watching myself kill my best friend. I had no choice. What does El have to say about forgiveness?'' - Balibray

After escaping the arena at the cost of his friend's life, former gladiator Balibray finds himself adrift as destiny conspires to lead him to an ancient city beneath the waves, to the court of an ancient goddess, and to find a forgotten king.

As mysterious bargains are struck, services rendered, and birthrights reclaimed, Balibray will look deep into his own soul and find himself...lacking.

As he battles monsters, slavers, and unbearable memories, he will question his past, his present, and his faith.

Winning his freedom was just the beginning...

''Slave: the Depths'' is 86 pages of high fantasy action, set in a world of swords and sorcery.

Tony Millionaire's Sock Monkey is one of the great all-ages comics properties of the new millennium, spawning plush dolls, TV appearances, lunch boxes, Zippo lighters and more. Now, for the first time, all twelve of multiple Eisner Award-winner Tony Millionaire's acclaimed Sock Monkey all-ages comic books (1998-2007, originally published by Dark Horse Comics) are collected under one cover, as well as the full-color graphic novella "Uncle Gabby" (2004) and the full-color illustrated storybook, "The Glass Doorknob" (2002), ready to be devoured by a new generation of young readers.

The precocious sock monkey Uncle Gabby and his innocent pal Mr. Crow are the heroes of this funny, unsettling and endearing collection. Follow them as they try to find a home for a shrunken head, play matchmakers between the bat in the doll's house and the mouse in the basement, unlock the mysteries of a glass doorknob, hunt salamanders, try to get to heaven, and much more.

The book also includes the only full-length Sock Monkey graphic novel, "The Inches Incident." Inches the doll was the cutest in the whole house and loved by everyone. Then one day... Inches turned EVIL! What will Mr. Crow and Uncle Gabby do? Beloved by adults and children, Sock Monkey harkens back to a time when comics actually were for kids.
name: HC

description: When a missing man turns up dead, the detectives assigned to his case find themselves on the trail of a serial killer.
name: Still

description:
All Christopher Shelley wanted was to put an in-ground swimming pool in his backyard. But when human bones are discovered buried beneath his ground, the project has to be put on hold.

While Shelley waits for the police and archeologists and construction crews to do their work, the skull from his backyard takes on an increasingly large-and strange-role in his life.

Lone and Level is a meditation on wealth, what we do to make life meaningful, and the things we can't avoid.

Lone and Level will be serialized for free at Split Lip (www.splitlipcomic.com) from January through March 2015. Read the entire story right now--and get behind the scenes scripts, layouts, and pencils--by getting it at comiXology.

volume.name: Split Lip Presents: Lone and Level

description:
TheGreyNinja vs TheSilverSlash an anti-graffiti vigilante and a graffiti ninja find themselves in an all out turf war over ideologies and buckets of paint!!

this comic also contains bonus material in the back, including character designs, the original script, and a step-by-step 'making of' for one of the pages - giving you a unique look behind the scenes.

Satan's Stagecoach

In this premiere, gun-slinging issue of Tim Holt Western Adventures we meet Tim Holt, cowboy and movie star. This first issue was originally published in A-1 Comics No. 14. Join our favorite hero in the following stories...

An unbreakable stallion, a stagecoach that kills, and a sagebrush rustler trouble tim in "Satan's Stagecoach". When the paths of Tim and Chito cross paths with a long-dead conquistadore fists fly as he tries to solve the riddle of "The Spur of the Conquistadore". Tim finds Sheriff Zane mortally wounded and plunges into an inferno of bullets and bandits to save "The Sheriff of Rail's End".

Plus more and vintage advertisements.

One of the most famous of cowboys, Hollywood actor Tim Holt, is featured in these exciting Western tales of heroes, villains and outlaws.

Enjoy a nostalgic trip down memory lane with the best titles from the golden age of comics. Yojimbo Press has lovingly remastered these timeless classics with vivid color correction and image restoration.
name: Satan's Stagecoach

description:
Wednesday is dissatisfied with her life under a scrap yard and curious about the outside world. Sure, it's the post-apocalypse out there, but anything beats living under a pile of junk with your dad.

On the eve of her sixteenth birthday, Wednesday's father is kidnapped by bounty hunters. In order to save him, Wednesday must venture into the unknown with her only friends; sock monkeys Manny, Moe and Jack.

Armed with only her wits, and driving a rocking 1970 Plymouth Barracuda, Wednesday must overcome bandits, killer robots and a deadly assassin from the past.

Billed as "The Strangest Super-Heroes of All!," the ever-uncanny X-Men blasted onto the comic-book scene in 1963. Now, in this massive Epic Collection, you can feast your eyes as Stan, Jack & Co. lay down the building blocks of comics' most famous franchise! You'll experience the beginning of Professor X's teen team, and their mission for peace and brotherhood between man and mutant; their first battle with arch-foe Magneto; the dynamic debuts of Juggernaut, the Sentinels, Quicksilver, the Scarlet Witch and the Brotherhood of Evil Mutants; and the Golden Age jungle man, Ka-Zar, reinvented for a new era! All this and more Epic X-Men adventures await within! Collecting X-MEN (1963) #1-23.
name: TPB

volume.name: X-Men Epic Collection: Children of the Atom

description: Armed with the Magic of Aether, Zerotens stand against the demons, which are the dark manifestations of fear and dread. Revealing unto all, the truth of our reality; before the weight of the demons, consume the world. The 4 Mighty Ones, greatest of the Zerotens, have returned to Earth from the mythical Land of Orare to confront the darkness that rests at the heart of the Valley of Darca. Descending from this mythical realm, four Zerotens seek to reawaken Darzenian souls and reveal the Magic of Aether. But, in their desires to save mankind, their aspirations awaken the souls of their greatest enemies.

Diana agreed to represent the Justice League as the first space station for harvesting Venusian fuel gases is brought online. But the entrepreneur in charge of the project may be hiding something, and he's not the only one...Venus itself has some big surprises in store!
name: Venus Rising Part 1 of 2

description:
Demon Seeds

The last chapter as Big Weird plays nurse maid to hungry baby maggot monsters while Slug Nutty seeks his final revenge. The Kid will judge the victor.
name: Demon Seeds

description: A massive black-and-white volume collecting classic tales of the Legionnaires, from ADVENTURE COMICS #247, 267, 282, 290, 293, and 300-328, ACTION COMICS #267, 276, 287 and 289, SUPERBOY #86, 89, 98 and 117, SUPERMAN 147, SUPERMAN ANNUAL #4, and SUPERMAN'S PAL, JIMMY OLSEN#72 and 76!
name: Volume 1

description: Over 500 pages of classic Legion adventures, collected from the pages of ADVENTURE COMICS #316, #322-348, #365, SUPERBOY #117 and #125, and SUPERMAN ANNUAL #4!
name: Volume 2

description: The Legion battles the Fatal Five and is forced to expel Superboy and Supergirl in this new volume collecting stories from ADVENTURE COMICS #349-368 and SUPERMAN'S PAL, JIMMY OLSEN #116.
name: Volume 3

description: In this volume, the Legion battles Mordru the Merciless and The Fatal Five and meets The Tornado Twins. Collecting ADVENTURE COMICS #369-380, ACTION COMICS #378-387, 389-392 and SUPERBOY #172, 173, 176, 183, 184, 188, 190 and 191.
name: Volume 4

description: “The worlds we live in are just too different!” After his imprisonment in Hong Kong, Akihito returns to Japan with Asami…and slips away to freedom! But when a celebrity stalking case gets the hotheaded photographer mixed up with a pure psychopath, Asami’s underworld influence once again seems to be everywhere…
name: Passion within the Viewfinder

description:
The Origin: This is a reprint Space Adventures #33

Atlas was an experimental rocket that was launched into space with Military Scientist Allen Adam accidentally on board. It was was set to detonated 300 miles above the earth. At the instant of fission Allen was atomized at the atomic structure. It was then that his body was vaporized. Miraculously Allen reforms his own body and finds that he has harnessed the very power of the atom from within. He ends up donning a Diulustel Shielding Suit designed to protect ordinary humans from his potential radiation.

The second Man in Space: This is a reprint of Space Adventures #34

Igor Kriss is a Russian Astronaut who was supposed to be the first person in space. When launched into space however he suffered an accident rendering him unconscious. Captain Atom discovered him and saves his life with 1000 units of space vaccine. Once realizing Captain Atom is the first man in space he subsequently realizes he is the second and afterwords he lets his country know live on TV, much to the chagrin of his leaders.

On Planet X: This is a reprint of Space Adventures #36

Planet X was created by the United State Air Force in 1960. It is a satellite that orbits the earth with all known weather equipment, Geiger counters and, a missile guidance system. It also takes highly magnified television pictures of any potential military threat around the world. As a spy satellite it drew the attention of enemy nations and was a attacked several times with missiles but Captain Atom deflected all the attacks. As none of the nations knew how their missiles were destroyed it was thought that the satellite had defense systems. This kept the satellite safe from enemy attacks.
name: The Origin

volume.name: How to Draw Manga: Next Generation
Love Story Picture Library Holiday Special
Wonderful wonder world: The country of clubs

description: The concluding chapter of "The Hangman of Terror." Batman gets into the ring with the masked wrestler in an attempt to reveal his true identity.
name: The Hangman of Terror Chapter 3 of 4

description: Superman Annual #11, DC Comics Presents #85
name: Especial Verano

description: Action Comics Annual #1
name: Especial Verano

description: Superman #423, Action Comics #583, Action Comics #1
name: Especial Navidad

description: Superman #23, Adventures of Superman #445
name: Especial Verano

description: Action Comics Annual #2
Superman Annual #1, The Superman Family #220
name: Especial Verano

description: Action Comics #650, Superman #41
name: Especial Primavera

description: Adventures of Superman Annual #2
name: Especial Verano

description: A "Teaser" preview of JP Roths REM:8.
name: Teaser

description: Tae offers herself up for the safety of her friend, but is betrayed when the Senji lords torture & kill her in a brutal fashion.

On each anniversary of 100 years of life, the members of the Seelie Court are made human; and while they are thus mortal, they are hunted by the Unseelie Fae who need the Seelie blood to break out of their fading—the use of magic that causes the Fae to revert to bark and earth.

Selyara's 100th birthday has arrived and if she survives she'll take her throne, dispossessing her regent, Lavara. But Lavara has other ideas...
name: TPB

volume.name: How to Draw Manga: Next Generation
